title: 匠魂的客户端崩溃问题（空液体错误）
author: tlf007
txt_content:
虽然是在服务器上玩，但崩溃的是客户端，崩溃发生在打开冶炼炉的GUI之后,客户端直接闪退。
匠魂版本：1.6.0d40，forge版本 1.13.3.1304

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I blame Dinnerbone.

Time: 15-5-23 下午11:18
Description: Rendering screen

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot create a fluidstack from a null fluid
        at net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack.<init>(FluidStack.java:36)
        at net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack.<init>(FluidStack.java:67)
        at tconstruct.smeltery.gui.SmelteryGui.drawGuiContainerForegroundLayer(SmelteryGui.java:160)
        at tconstruct.client.gui.NewContainerGui.func_73863_a(NewContainerGui.java:165)
        at tconstruct.smeltery.gui.SmelteryGui.func_73863_a(SmelteryGui.java:60)
        at net.minecraft.client.renderer.EntityRenderer.func_78480_b(EntityRenderer.java:1061)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_71411_J(Minecraft.java:1001)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_99999_d(Minecraft.java:898)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:148)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:135)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(SourceFile:124)

replies.author: sb023612
replies.txt_content:
tlf007 发表于 2015-5-27 01:12
打错forge的版本了，其实是1403
还是那句话，升级匠魂版本或者改变forge版本

replies.author: sb023612
replies.txt_content: 最新版本的匠魂仅支持1355及更高版本的forge，要么更好匠魂版本，要么更换forge版本

replies.author: tlf007
